creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: monochromatic image of an angel "Fame" holding a trumpet and orb; a reclining male figure below leaning on a spilling bucket with the Roman wolf and two infants, Romulus and Remus, at his feet and the dome of St. Peter's basilica behind him
object_name: One of a pair of oil sketches
title: "Impleat Orbem" The Tiber and Fame Spreading Their Glory
